title: Ahmedabad blasts case verdict: Two from Mangaluru among convicts sentenced - Daijiworld.com

description:
Daijiworld Media Network – Mangaluru (MS)
Mangaluru, Feb 20: Three among the 38 accused who have been sentenced to death in the 2008 Ahmedabad serial blast case are from Karnataka. Two of them are from natives of Mangaluru.
Syed Mohammed Naushad (30), resident of Subhashnagar near Pandeshwar, Ahmed Bawa Abubaker Ba.....
